title: Ethical guidelines consequences of psych diagnosis

content.prompt: Dr. Brennan is interested in investigating the negative and positive consequences of diagnosing his female patients with bipolar disorder. To ensure that ethical procedures are followed, what must Dr. Brennan do prior to beginning the research study?

choices.label: Ensure that a random sample of subjects is selected
Receive informed consent from each of the participants
Assign subjects randomly to control and experimental groups

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
